humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, 'Multiple (3) left axillary sentinel lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma' (AJCC pNO (i-) (sn)) and 'A single left axillary non-sentinel lymph node (adjacent to left axillary sentinel lymph node No. 1) is negative for metastatic carcinoma'. Based on the new rules 10 and 11, N0 indicates no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes or that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that multiple (3) left axillary sentinel lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma and a single left axillary non-sentinel lymph node is also negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage is N0.
